title-group.article-title: Erratum: Hwang Y.T. et al. Molecular Inconsistencies in a Fragile X Male with Early Onset Ataxia. Genes 2016, 7, 68

body.p: The authors wish to make the following correction to their paper [1]. The authors’ affiliations are wrong and should be replaced with:

p.bold: Yun Tae Hwang 1,2, Tracy Dudding 3,4, Solange Mabel Aliaga 5,6,7, Marta Arpone 5,6,10, David Francis 5, Xin Li 5, Howard Robert Slater 5,6, Carolyn Rogers 3, Lesley Bretherton 8,9,10, Desirée du Sart 11, Robert Heard 12,13,† and David Eugeny Godler 5,*,†

body.p: The authors would like to apologize for any inconvenience caused. The change does not affect the scientific results. The manuscript will be updated and the original will remain online on the article webpage.

notes.title: Conflicts of Interest
notes.p: The authors declare no conflict of interest.
